title: Setup your own Blog in under 5 minutes
description: This tutorial assumes you have the following installed on your system: > - An active GitHub account - GIT - NodeJS 1.- Get your own repo Login into your GitHub account and start a new repo. Use vue3-md-blog as a template Public Dir Structure 2.- Configure your src/blog_config.ts file, i.e: VUEAPPPOSTSPERPAGE: 5, VUEAPPMAINBGCSS_COLOR: 'white', VUEAPPMAINTEXTCSS_COLOR: 'black', 3.- Test locally Make sure your terminal is...

title: Use inline bootstrap-ready html
description: Another advantage of runtime template compilation is that we can make good use of bootstrap predefined classes since our app has already loaded all its css. .bg-primary .bg-secondary .bg-success .bg-danger .bg-warning .bg-info .bg-light .bg-dark .bg-white Use inline bootstrap-ready html June 26, 2019 Another advantage of runtime template compilation is that we can make good use of bootstrap predefined classes since our app has already...

title: Posts are compiled with markdown-it
description: You can simply edit your markdown files online and your blog will reflect the changes shortly after. Posts are compiled from Markdown to html in runtime Use inline html with bootstrap classes ready to go within your markdowns Support for GitHub Pages CSS and emojis Features Headings h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading h1 Heading 8-) h2...
